subtitle: Hello everyone! Welcome back to Astral Doorway, great to see so many new subscribers we're almost
at 1000 and we've only just begun really, there are so many things to cover so if you enjoy these
videos be sure to subscribe and if you really enjoyed the videos why not support the channel
through Patreon? So in this video I'm going to explore some of the ways that you can protect
yourself from dark or negative experiences as well as giving some examples of my own... we may get
a little more esoteric or occult in some parts since when it comes to dealing with negative
forces especially when dealing with particularly evil beings you'll find most
of them are very interested in deep occult topics because these are beings who are not interested in
enlightenment love or helping our fellow humanity uh they're only obsessed with power usually so
understanding some of the occult side of things can be helpful in understanding them and
protecting ourselves, before i go any further i want to say that i don't usually talk about
or reveal any of my negative experiences and for good reasons one of them being that i simply don't
have many of them out of all of my experiences negative ones have probably amounted to only
around five percent and through the understanding i have now even if i meet some form of evil entity
i don't necessarily see the experience as negative anymore because of how i consider them in a
different light; that is to seek understanding rather than succumb to our usual instinct
of feeling fear in the face of these negative experiences but more on that as we continue
i also just think that talking about such things is almost of very little use for others especially
because people easily become scared or interpret it as fear-mongering but i understand this is a
very popular topic and one of the most frequently asked questions and experiences that are negative
or frightening do happen because our level of consciousness is always diving into deeper and
perhaps more scarier territories of consciousness, and you know when you compare your positive and
transcendental experiences with the negative ones, the negative ones really become of little interest
in contrast, you know if you're one of those people who say "i don't think i should astral project
because i might have some very scary experiences" well don't you think that you can have amazing and
life-changing experiences too? don't you think that most of the things worth pursuing in life
don't have some aspect of risk? don't you think that if you're just going to be scared all the
time and focus on possible negative outcomes that that's more likely to happen? the key is in staying
focused on your goals that you set out to achieve - not getting caught up in silly ghost stories
but yeah astral projection is completely worth it and you'll realize that when you start getting
a lot of experience under your belt and when you do, you won't even care or worry about negative
experiences at all, also most of my negative ones were more in the first few years of astral
projecting i think there's something natural about gaining experience that makes it become less
of an occurrence - i also want to strongly assert that all of the following experiences did not
result in much fear really, they weren't pleasant but i didn't feel that much fair uh perhaps
i had you know some fear during the experience but definitely not afterwards where i would
always come back to my physical bed safely, maybe that's just me, but it really should be the mindset
of every astral projector too, to come back to the physical body and seek understanding, meditation
impartialness, and not become fearful, scared and write a thousand-word post on reddit
fear-mongering about how astral projecting is dangerous because poor little you saw a scary face
you know succumbing to fear is only going to attract more fear - courage is an essential
ingredient to astral projection... so with all that said let me give some examples of some
of my experiences and how i dealt with them - one experience was where i found myself in a large
empty building and i was talking to a seemingly normal lady who was talking to me about topics
of psychology and she seemed to want to help me anyway shortly after she said "okay i have
someone who is going to help you", i said "okay" i waited around and after some time this large ogre
type looking man comes in and with his presence i immediately feel a strange energy that begins to
build up till eventually i fully realize that the woman i was talking to for a good five minutes
had been manipulating me to converse with them and their lower or perverse energy and once i realize
this the ogre man runs at me and pushes me to the ground he holds me down and before i could think
to do anything he stomps on my head; the first instinct was just to wake up which i did
and of course i was fine, uh but a funny thing about this is when i woke up i did feel
some sort of phantom pain in my head and i was feeling around my head and i immediately
went to the mirror to check if i was okay uh the sensation only lasted for maybe one
or two minutes, he must have done something to me energetically but it was only a minuscule
attack - i wanted to reveal this one because out of my 10 years of hundreds of experiences this was
the one experience i've had where i actually felt some sort of subtle pain or that i was actually
attacked you know? which in the end really amounted to nothing, those two beings didn't feel dangerous
at all especially compared to the next two experiences i had which seemed to involve
more sophisticated evil beings but as you'll see i wasn't actually attacked in the end due
to how i handled the situation, so in this other experience i was in a village and i saw a sort of
spiritual trinket shop so i thought i'd go in and as i'm looking around a man the owner
of the shop talks to me and asks me if i'm into spiritual things, i say yes and we talk about some
occult stuff for a few minutes then he eventually asks me with a strange and sinister smile on his
face if i'm interested in ouija boards and he goes to pick one up and shows me i say to him
quite clearly that i'm not interested in any sort of black magic but he tries to convince me
of its greatness somehow and he says how amazing it is but i just ignore him and leave because he's
clearly interested in things that i'm not but as i get near to leaving his shop things start to
become darker and he blocks my way and uh this was strange but he's now turned into a woman and not
a normal looking woman a clearly male looking transexual for some reason and and he tries
to convince me one more time to come with him i immediately sense his evil intent and i jump up
to fly away and just as i'm flying in the air he raises his hands towards me as if to cast
a force to stop me mid-air, and that's what he did i was trying my best to continue to fly
away but i was truly stuck mid-air it was quite an excruciating feeling to be forced into a solitary
position in the air even though i desperately tried to move, at this point there was a bit
of panic in me so i called upon some help i said something like "masters and angels of light help me
and protect me" i pleaded and begged in my heart and suddenly to my surprise i saw the planet Mars
in the most vivid detail i've ever seen it; i was surprised as this was completely spontaneous and
unintended and as i was looking at Mars i realized i was freed from that experience with that man
who was keeping me there and now i was in a sort of void looking at Mars and i could feel this
low vibration and hum that came from the planet, after this i had a moment of unconsciousness
and then continued on as normal in the astral and eventually woke up and when i woke up i
realized that mars is actually supposed to be a planet of force or strength being related to the
zodiac sign Aries, so somehow the energy of Mars helped me to break away from the grip
of that man i'll leave a couple of links below about Mars in this sense, so this is an example
of how you can call upon general masters or guides or forces to help you in such moments you can also
call upon their names specifically as well if you have taken a specific liking to a certain master
or angel etc. in my last example i was walking down a neighborhood road in the astral
it was normal sunny weather and i remember just really enjoying the experience of being in the
astral i eventually walked into a cul-de-sac and there was a tall man in the middle of the road
it's hard to describe him to give it justice uh but he was probably
yeah he is uh the most powerful negative entity i've ever met simply from reading his aura
and energy which emanated a silent and controlled power which was negatively
charged power of course uh he was dressed in a black suit he was bald and he had gray skin
as i looked at him he locked eyes with me and began to walk towards me, there's something about
uh being self-conscious that he picked up on, maybe he picked up on some fear but i don't know
as soon as he spotted me he wanted to attack me and i knew this instantly, as i looked at him
he locked eyes with me and began to walk towards me his eyes were instantly hypnotic
and i simply just couldn't get away from him; i actually started walking towards him
against my will as if he was suddenly a center of gravity like a black hole ready to consume me
as i got closer the sky above began to turn gray and dark and i felt the true power of this
seven foot tall menacing person and there was a sort of ominous electricity in the air, this wasn't
just some ogre like in the first experience i mentioned, this being was intelligent and powerful
a true demon or black magician most likely and once he got within inches of me
i immediately did the following mantra of protection that my Gnostic teacher taught me, so
this is the second mantra i'm teaching now and it goes "Helion Melion Ttragrammaton", when this
mantra is said in the astral plane it protects you from negative forces and as you say it you
mentally trace or visualize a circle of fire around you and that's what i did; i've used
this mantra multiple times with great success - if you're wondering how it's pronounced it goes
"HEELLIOONN MELLIOONNN TETRAGRAMMATONNN"
you can space each word out with a breath in between or just say it's all in one breath
like i just did - there's a lot to this mantra so i'll leave some links below if you're interested
in studying it in depth but in summary the word tetragrammaton relates to the upright pentagram
the upright pentagram the five star symbol that you can see on the screen represents the ascension
and divinity of the human being, it's a very positive symbol that negative entities or beings
do not like and which is why they use that symbol in an inverted way, and when it's used in that way
by black magicians for example it represents the devolution of man with the five points of the star
being the arms legs and head like how you can see on the screen, so, it represents an upside down man
so upright is man ascending to the heavens in his microcosmic inner star towards the light
and the inverted is man upside down falling in consciousness 0 now our ultimate goal on this path
is to go beyond good and evil right as discussed in previous videos uh for us on this spiritual
path we need to go beyond separation and duality however in those moments if you're being attacked
in the astral, then you want to fight using the forces of light, positivity and love right?
they're using inverted negative forces against you so you should reprimand with positive ones
in order to neutralize those forces, anyway and so when i did the mantra while casting a fire
of protection around me at the same time and he was just so very close to me i began to see the
world around me shift and morph like all the forms around me were becoming a sort of tornado and i
saw a grassy platform float in front of me which i walked onto and i escaped into a completely other
dimension where that entity didn't exist and i was back in a sunny environment in the middle of an
open grassy field, so yeah he was powerful probably more powerful than me and i'm grateful to have
known how to use that mantra i highly recommend using it in times of being attacked and you can
also use it before going to sleep at night too - i do this mantra every night and i barely have any
negative experiences - as you go to sleep in your bed simply visualize a circle of fire around you
while mentally reciting the mantra this will protect you during your sleep whether you're
consciously or unconsciously projecting, this can also help with having less nightmares as well
you don't need to do the mantra you can just visualize a circle of fire or a circle of light
but honestly the mantra helps, as well as this you can also keep an altar as a symbol of protection
in your home while you astral project, it should be square shaped with a white cloth on it; i say
this because black magicians often use altars that are circle shaped with black cloths on it
similarly you can burn a white candle on it all the time or whenever you're present in the house...
you can place deities or symbols you consider holy sacred protective or powerful and you can
also burn incense in your house; preferably real frankincense or copal resin or sage
and you can burn these on charcoal discs in a clay pot; i'll leave a video on how to use proper
incense as well as opposed to just incense sticks there's a lot of impure incense sticks that
aren't natural and just full of chemicals and they don't really have natural metaphysical benefits
so yes you can visualize a fire of light or protection around your house three times before
you sleep and you can combine this with prayer and mantras you can ask angels, gods, masters, guides or
any other type of positive force to help you with protection and astral projection, again this should
also help with experiencing fewer nightmares, so as you cast the circle of protection or mantra lies
or light incense you can say a prayer which goes something like this "angel, masters and guides
of the astral plane, protect this house in a spiritual camouflage so that no evil or darkness
can penetrate it cast away all kinds of negative forces or energies"... and you can finish this prayer
with the mantra om or our men three times do this all with positive emotions and complete
faith ~ and then you can sleep peacefully and focus on your goals of astral projection
now i've heard of random little stories of people having prolonged experiences with
negative entities, i don't know how true those are but luckily i've never had such experiences
any time i have it's only lasted maybe two or three minutes max because every time i meet a
being who i know is malicious and only has evil intent i "do" something in return right?
i don't just "do nothing" and be passive, no, you have to do something even if it's just to wake
up - every experienced national projector knows that you can simply wake up from an experience by
willing it there's not much to it but if you don't want to wake up and you're feeling more
courageous then i hear a lot of people also say to project the feeling of love onto these beings
which i'm sure could work but that kind of description is a little vague; this feeling of love
should be combined with intention, willpower and imagination to conjure up some kind of
expelling / disarming force right? whether it's to conjure up and cast a white light which sends
them away or perhaps to imagine a shield of force protecting you, either way the type of love talked
about here should be a divine and transcendental type right? not just a human sort of love it should
be a kind of spiritual divine justice type of love not the type of love you have for your puppy right?
because trust me if you ever meet an evil being they're nothing like a cute little puppy...
quite the opposite - alternatively instead of protecting yourself energetically you can also
choose to simply teleport to another location or dimension you can do this simply by intending it
if you're struggling you can repeat to yourself the location you want to go
to mentally, like i did with the woman in the video where i tried to wake unconscious
people up in the astral. so, this video is getting a little long, i can do another video on
more of my negative experiences and how you can protect yourself but i hope this helps
i'm sure there are many other ways you can protect yourself in the astral but these
are generally the things that i do, there are of course the obvious little things you can do such
as raising your vibration, being happy, eating and living well, meditating daily, wishing humanity
enlightenment and liberation and love, and you know just living from a higher place within yourself
if you're a very depressed or violent person then naturally you're going to be more prone to
those kinds of experiences in the astral - so if you have any things that you do to protect yourself
or maybe you've had some interesting experiences that you've had with negative entities
feel free to share them below and as always if you have any questions
please let me know happy and safe travels everyone and i'll see you on the next episode
